alternate_methods:
Contact the Driving Standards Agency.

$C
**Driving Standards Agency**  
**Tel:** 0300 200 1122  
**Tel:** 0300 200 1133 (Welsh speakers)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166 
$C
introduction: Use this tool to change your driving theory test to an earlier or later date, or change your test centre. You'll need your provisional licence number.
more_information:
You'll need your provisional driving licence number.

You can only change bookings that have already been confirmed.

%You must give at least 3 working days notice or you may need to pay again.%
overview: Change the date of your driving theory test or change your test centre - you'll need your provisional licence number
title: Change the date of your driving theory test
